mapper.insert: insert into qnaboard (idx, title, contents, counts, crea_dtm, userid) values(SEQ_QNABOARD_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{counts}, sysdate, #{userid})
mapper.update: update qnaboard set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, userid=#{userid} where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select idx, title, contents, counts, crea_dtm, userid from qnaboard order by idx desc, crea_dtm desc
